title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       American Sign Language Interpretation is available upon request. Please contact Scott Rector at 845-229-9115 Ext. 2025 at least 14 days prior to your visit. The first floor of the Val-Kill Cottage is wheelchair accessible.  Accessible parking and restrooms are available. The introductory film, "Close to Home," now offers captioning and audio description/narrations for those with hearing or visual impairments. The headphones and controllers for the visual descriptions will be available at the visitor center desk. Please ask for assistance. The Val-Kill Brochure is available in Braille.  Please inquire at the Visitor Center upon arrival.
